---
title: "Gallery"
# Note: This page uses client-side password protection, which provides only basic
# content obscurity. The password is visible in the page source, and anyone with
# technical knowledge can bypass this protection. This is suitable for light content
# protection only. For stronger security, consider implementing server-side authentication.
---

```{=html}
<style>
  .password-container {
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 50px;
  }

  .password-input {
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 16px;
    margin: 10px;
  }

  .primary-button {
    padding: 10px 20px;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    background-color: #007bff;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    margin-top: 10px;
  }

  .error-message {
    color: red;
    margin-top: 10px;
  }

  .gallery-content {
    display: none;
  }

  .gallery-section {
    margin-top: 30px;
  }

  .gallery-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(250px, 1fr));
    gap: 20px;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }

  .gallery-item {
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
    padding: 15px;
    border-radius: 8px;
  }

  .logout-button {
    padding: 10px 20px;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    background-color: #dc3545;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    margin-top: 30px;
  }
</style>

<div id="password-container" class="password-container">
  <h2>Password Protected Gallery</h2>
  <p>Please enter the password to access the gallery:</p>
  <input type="password" id="password-input" placeholder="Enter password" class="password-input">
  <br>
  <button onclick="checkPassword()" class="primary-button">Submit</button>
  <p id="error-message" class="error-message"></p>
</div>

<div id="gallery-content" class="gallery-content">
  <h2>Welcome to the Gallery</h2>
  
  <p>This is a password-protected gallery page for the McPherson Lab.</p>
  
  <div class="gallery-section">
    <h3>Gallery Content</h3>
    <p>Add your gallery images, videos, and other content here.</p>
    
    <!-- Example placeholder content -->
    <div class="gallery-grid">
      <div class="gallery-item">
        <h4>Gallery Item 1</h4>
        <p>Description of gallery item 1</p>
      </div>
      <div class="gallery-item">
        <h4>Gallery Item 2</h4>
        <p>Description of gallery item 2</p>
      </div>
      <div class="gallery-item">
        <h4>Gallery Item 3</h4>
        <p>Description of gallery item 3</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <button onclick="logout()" class="logout-button">Logout</button>
</div>

<script>
  // Password will be injected during GitHub Actions build
  const GALLERY_PASSWORD = '{{GALLERY_PW}}';
  
  // Check if user is already authenticated
  function checkAuth() {
    const isAuthenticated = sessionStorage.getItem('galleryAuth') === 'true';
    if (isAuthenticated) {
      showGallery();
    }
  }
  
  // Verify password
  function checkPassword() {
    const input = document.getElementById('password-input');
    const errorMsg = document.getElementById('error-message');
    
    if (input.value === GALLERY_PASSWORD) {
      sessionStorage.setItem('galleryAuth', 'true');
      showGallery();
      errorMsg.textContent = '';
    } else {
      errorMsg.textContent = 'Incorrect password. Please try again.';
      input.value = '';
    }
  }
  
  // Show gallery content
  function showGallery() {
    document.getElementById('password-container').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('gallery-content').style.display = 'block';
  }
  
  // Logout function
  function logout() {
    sessionStorage.removeItem('galleryAuth');
    document.getElementById('password-container').style.display = 'block';
    document.getElementById('gallery-content').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('password-input').value = '';
  }
  
  // Allow Enter key to submit
  document.getElementById('password-input')?.addEventListener('keypress', function(event) {
    if (event.key === 'Enter') {
      checkPassword();
    }
  });
  
  // Check authentication on page load
  checkAuth();
</script>
```
